name: listAppend
description: Concatenates a list or element to a list and returns the concatenated list.

params.name: list
params.description: A list or variable with the list.

params.name: value
params.description: An element or a list of elements.

params.name: delimiters
params.description: A string or variable with a character that separates list elements.

params.name: includeEmptyFields
params.description: CF2018+ Set to true to append blank values to the list.

examples.title: Simple listAppend Example
examples.description: Add 'foo' to the end of this list

examples.title: Simple listAppend Example with Delimiter
examples.description: Add 'foo' to the end of this list using a custom delimiter

examples.title: Simple listAppend Example with Empty Fields On
examples.description: CF2018+ Add 'foo,,' to the end of this list using includeEmptyFields as true

examples.title: Simple listAppend Example with Empty Fields Off
examples.description: CF2018+ Add 'foo' to the end of this list using includeEmptyFields as false
